long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Save Help" is a cheeky but helpful Chrome Extension that alters text in shopping sites like Amazon, Etsy, eBay, and Shopify. It turns dollar signs into snide "Can you afford $XX.XX?" statements, and replaces "Log in to your account" with "Can you afford to log in?" Save Help uses cajoling language that pester and breaks down an online shopper's motivation and resolve.
